item.description: On Tuesday, November 16, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Evil and the Ontological Disproof of God,” a talk by Carl Brownson (PhD candidate) developing the ontological disproof as a modal version of the problem of evil, based in part on J. N. Findlay’s “Can God’s Existence Be Disproved?” (1948). Location: Rm. 442 of the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society talk: "Evil and the Ontological Disproof of God"
